title: Diamond Emerald Leaf Haaram with Matching Earrings
materials: Natural Emerald Cabochon. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Delicate leaf-motif design, meticulously set with sparkling diamonds. Features a central Emerald cabochon pendant. The accompanying earrings echo the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and elegant set. The diamonds are set in a prong setting to maximize brilliance and fire. Gold chain with intricate mesh-like construction.
occasions: or any special occasion where you desire a touch of sophisticated glamour. Perfectly complements traditional silk sarees or modern evening wear.
description: This stunning necklace set combines timeless elegance with contemporary design. The vibrant emerald accent and the shimmering diamonds create a captivating and luxurious look. Crafted with the highest quality materials and attention to detail, this Haaram is a true heirloom piece, a reflection of your refined taste and appreciation for fine jewelry. The design is lightweight and comfortable for extended wear, and the high-quality materials ensure lasting brilliance.
